name: Elude Catastrophe
description:
NOTE will take some time to load cause its a heavy file

if game stucks at loading please reload the page

controls

movement

w and s

shoot

lmb

shield

ctrl

welcome to the zekit corporation  we had created a new technology(TECH) for our mechs but unfortunately it got stolen and now we fear that it should be destroyed otherwise the mech with the new tech in it i.e plasma cannons can destroy the world

you have been given to find the lost mech with its plasma cannon and destroy the mech and the tech

find keys, solve mazes and destroy other mechs and monsters in this game
